title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis for GeneradorArteIa
description: Identify the essential features, functionalities, and user requirements for GeneradorArteIa. This involves understanding the artistic styles to be supported, the types of content to be generated, defining the parameters that will shape each piece, and ensuring scalability and customization options. Additionally, consider the necessary APIs, databases, and security measures required for this project.

title: Design the Art Generator Architecture
description: Develop the high-level design of the AI art generator application

title: Database Design for GeneradorArteIa
description: Design the database schema and structure for storing art-related data and parameters

title: Frontend Design and Development
description: Create the user interface for users to interact with GeneradorArteIa

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the server-side logic for GeneradorArteIa, including AI and data processing

title: Integration and Testing of GeneradorArteIa Components
description: Combine frontend, backend, and database components and test their integration

title: Security Audit of GeneradorArteIa
description: Assess the application's vulnerabilities and ensure secure data handling
dependencies: Integration and Testing of GeneradorArteIa Components

title: Quality Assurance Testing
description: Test the functionality, performance, and usability of GeneradorArteIa

title: Documentation for GeneradorArteIa
description: Write technical documentation for developers and users
dependencies: Integration and Testing of GeneradorArteIa Components
